Now lets talk about pressurized air and pO2. The air under pressure in that tire, say 2-3 ATM will have 2-3 times as much oxygen per unit volume as outside air, and you just started a fire, inside a highly flammable tire. There is a significant chance that combustion will continue inside the tire, increasing the pressure until the thing explodes.
